thread.title: Jose Mourinho explains how Paul Pogba's mum will feel when Manchester United meet St Etienne
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho explains how Paul Pogba's mum will feel when Manchester United meet St Etienne

author: Stuart Mathieson
title: Jose Mourinho explains how Paul Pogba's mum will feel when Manchester United meet St Etienne
text:
Sport Jose Mourinho explains how Paul Pogba's mum will feel when Manchester United meet St Etienne Man Utd midfielder Paul Pogba and his elder brother will face each other professionally for the first time at Old Trafford. Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Get Manchester United FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Jose Mourinho says there will only be one person struggling with the showdown between the Pogba brothers when Manchester United and Saint-Etienne meet in the Europa League. 
The Reds £89m world record buy Paul Pogba will face off with his 26-year-old elder sibling Florentin for the first time in their professional careers in the first leg tie at Old Trafford. 
The United manager has had chats with his midfielder Paul but feels sorry for Mrs Pogba! 
“Paul and I we spoke but in a good way, a funny way. It is a nice situation. Only mum Pogba is in trouble!” said Mourinho. 
“It is difficult for the lady to choose. Not difficult, impossible! 
“I know from Paul that his mum wants a draw. But next week one son will be happy and the other one sad. 
“It is only for mum a problem, for them they will enjoy it. It is a good thing.”
